body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

Simply adding shortcut for C breakpoints, which may trigger in CyGDB

```cython

# BREAKPOINT
# a simple 2 lines, but may require more checking for OS-type
# this works on linux
from libc.signal cimport raise_, SIGTRAP
raise_(SIGTRAP)

# ASSERTION
cdef extern from "assert.h":
    # Replacing name to avoid conflict with python assert keyword!
    void assert_ "assert"(bint)
# This will raise C-style assert
assert_(0)
```


### Describe the solution you'd like.

Instead of copy-pasting the code above, it would be great to have the following:

```cython
from cython.debugging import cyassert, cybreakpoint

cpdef main():
     cyassert(some_value, "Incorrect value")
     
     # Unconditionally break
     cybreakpoint(1)

     # Conditionally break
     cybreakpoint( i == 100)

```

### Describe alternatives you've considered.

I've created a project, a toolkit for dealing with Cython. I might include the requested features in my project, but it would be great to have it included in main Cython.

Simple example of how it could be:
https://github.com/alexveden/cython-tools/blob/main/src/cython_tools/_cy_tools_samples/debugging/assertions.pyx
https://github.com/alexveden/cython-tools/blob/main/src/cython_tools/_cy_tools_samples/debugging/breakpoint.pyx
